snippet.title: Just Dance VR Announce Trailer | Ubisoft Forward
snippet.description:
#JustDanceVR launches on October 15, 2024!

Welcome to the future of dance with Just Dance VR! Take dancing to a whole new level within an immersive world thanks to Virtual Reality. The music surrounds and immerses you in a way never seen before. Dance to your favorite songs in visually spectacular Danceverses!

An Audio Described version of this segment is available on YouTube here: https://youtu.be/bTWFoRLxMEU?t=625
We hope all players enjoy this content. #UbiForward #AudioDescription #A11y

Follow us for more exclusive info about the game and the tracklist:

INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/justdancegame/
TIKTOK: https://www.tiktok.com/@justdancegame/
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/justdancegame/ 
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/justdancegame
https://www.justdance.com

About Just Dance VR: 
Take dancing to a whole new level within an immersive world thanks to Virtual Reality. Dance in 360° iconic universes, roam freely & shine in your customizable avatar! In your Apartment, you can dance, play basketball & interact with fun items with up to 6 players.
Enjoy 25 new songs in this immersive environment including "Don’t Stop Me Now" By Queen, "Bad Liar" By Selena Gomez, "Starships" by Nicki Minaj, "Lights" By Elie Goulding, "Call Me Maybe" by Carly Rae Jepsen and "A Little Party Never Killed Nobody (All We Got)" By Fergie Ft. Q-tip, GoonRock #Ubisoft #JustDance

Just Dance VR has been developed by Ubisoft Paris in collaboration with Soul Assembly.

About Ubisoft:
Ubisoft is a creator of worlds, committed to enriching players’ lives with original and memorable entertainment experiences. Ubisoft’s global teams create and develop a deep and diverse portfolio of games, featuring brands such as Assassin’s Creed®, Brawlhalla®, For Honor®, Far Cry®, Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon®, Just Dance®, Rabbids®, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six®, The Crew®, Tom Clancy’s The Division®, and Watch Dogs®. Through Ubisoft Connect, players can enjoy an ecosystem of services to enhance their gaming experience, get rewards and connect with friends across platforms. With Ubisoft+, the subscription service, they can access a growing catalog of more than 100 Ubisoft games and DLC. For the 2021–22 fiscal year, Ubisoft generated net bookings of €2,129 million. To learn more, please visit: www.ubisoftgroup.com.

© 2024 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Just Dance, Ubisoft and the Ubisoft logo are registered trademarks in the US and/or other countries.
